page.title: 08ENGINEERING WORKS
page.content:
{ENGINEERING WORKS-WINESTEAD}
Set in one acre of grounds behind the residential bungalow is a one-man engineering firm specialising in wrought iron work making such items as gates. He also repairs builders' plant, overhauls diesel and petrol engines, working on his own premises or out on site if the plant is too big for him to cope with on his own premises.
The equipment owned is an electric welder, oxy-ecetyl4ne and drilling machines.
In the grounds, a dyke runs through the middle of the plot and has a pond with ducks residing there.
